function.name: media_playPrevious
function.description: This function is used to play the previous track or episode in a media application.

location.description: The location where the device is located.

room.description: The room where the device is located.

device.description: The name or type of the device to play the previous track or episode.

predefinedCompartment.description: The predefined compartment to play the previous track or episode.

appname.description: The name of the app to play the previous track or episode.

predefinedAppName.description: The predefined app name to play the previous track or episode.

title.description: The title of the content to play the previous track or episode.

cast.description: The cast of the content to play the previous track or episode.
